Package com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3.mvi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MviBasePresenter.ViewIntentBinder<V extends MvpView,I>
    The binder is responsible to bind a single view intent.
    MviBasePresenter.ViewStateConsumer<V extends MvpView,VS>
    This "binder" is responsible to bind the view state to the currently attached view.
    MviPresenter<V extends MvpView,VS>
    This type of presenter is responsible to interact with the viewState in a Model-View-Intent way.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MviActivity<V extends MvpView,P extends MviPresenter<V,?>>
    This abstract class can be used to extend from to implement an Model-View-Intent pattern with this activity as View and a MviPresenter to coordinate the View and the underlying model (business logic).
    MviBasePresenter<V extends MvpView,VS>
    This type of presenter is responsible to interact with the viewState in a Model-View-Intent way.
    MviFragment<V extends MvpView,P extends MviPresenter<V,?>>
    This abstract class can be used to extend from to implement an Model-View-Intent pattern with this activity as View and a MviPresenter to coordinate the View and the underlying model (business logic) Per default FragmentMviDelegateImpl is used with the following lifecycle: The View is attached to the Presenter in Fragment#onViewCreated(View, Bundle).
